A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall\, a great movie and a great Star Wars film. Maybe slightly too much humor in some scenes; could have dialed it back a little to propel the narrative forward. Some levity = good\, too much = distracting. Still\, Rian Johnson did a great job and this answered many questions\, added new ones\, and disregarded stories that didn't really matter in the end. Bring on Episode IX!
